text: Virginie Norbertina Maria Korte-van Hemel (May 8, 1929 - April 3, 2014) was a Dutch politician. She was a member of the CDA on behalf of the House and Senate. In the cabinets Lubbers I and Lubbers II, she was Secretary for Justice. She was also an alderman of Bussum from 1970 to 1974. Hemel was born in Bergen op Zoom and died in Bussum, aged 84.NOS - CDA'er Korte-van Hemel dies ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1929 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Aldermen of the Netherlands Category:Catholic People's Party politicians Category:Christian Democratic Appeal politicians Category:Deputy government ministers of the Netherlands Category:Dutch councillors Category:Dutch lawyers Category:Dutch Roman Catholics Category:Members of the House of Representatives of the Netherlands Category:Members of the Senate of the Netherlands Category:Politicians from North Brabant
title: Virginie Korte-van Hemel
